short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An Extension that allows the user to check the Word Count and Outline of a page. It also acts as a helper when using google searches

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Content outliner is 100% free SEO tool from GrowthTrip.com It will give you to get a quick overview of the SERP and its content. It will retrieve the H1s, H2s, H3s for all the pages ranking on page 1 as well as the People Also Ask Questions. 

For someone who creates content briefs this is the perfect tool to gain a quick understanding of the best content outline. It allows you to select the different headings you would like for your content.

It also shows you the word count of each page down the right hand side of the widget in search results as well as show you the word count of any page that you are on.
